sourcesContent: import{Card, Button, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import shortenText from '../../shared/utils' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // import './Phones.css' const PhoneDetailsCard = ({name, manufacturer, description, color, price, screen, processor, ram, imageFileName, _id}) => { return( {name} {manufacturer} | Price: ${(price * 1.15).toFixed(0)} ${price} {shortenText(description, 70)} {screen} | {processor} | {ram} | {color} Back to Index ) } export default PhoneDetailsCard
